<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Activate demand category types on SDLC plugin activation  if demand management plugin is activated</description>
        <name>Activate Demand Category Types </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if(GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.demand_management')){
	var choice = new GlideRecord("sys_choice");
	choice.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
	choice.addQuery('element','type');
	choice.query();
	while(choice.next()){
		if(choice.getValue('value') == 'defect' || choice.getValue('value') == 'enhancement'){
			choice.setValue('inactive','false');
			choice.setWorkflow(false);
			choice.update();
		}
	}
}]]></script>
